file_content.text: Well, I'll be... Garak sent word that he'd rustled up some folk to help, but ya'll's about the last thing I'd expected. Not that I ain't plenty glad about it.
Well, I'll be... Garak sent word that he'd rustled up some folk to help, but a Sith? Now I seen everything.
Well, I'll be... Garak sent word that he'd rustled up some folk to help, but you must be the meanest customer on this ice ball.
Glad to see those power converters, too. I understand Garak offered up his crew's pay. Here you go.
I best get back to figuring how we'll deliver the next shipment. Take care out there.
